statements: SELECT * FROM warehouse_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM warehouse_inventory WHERE location='A';
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM warehouse_inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT warehouse_id, location FROM warehouse_inventory ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_inventory WHERE product_id='2ed3444d-4cb9-4e10-820a-702f1ea9e50f';
SELECT warehouse_id, product_id, product_name, quantity, location FROM warehouse_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM warehouse_inventory WHERE location = 'Main' AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT warehouse_id, product_id, quantity FROM warehouse_inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%Chair%' AND location IN ('A1', 'B2')
SELECT warehouse_id, product_id, location FROM warehouse_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY location, product_id
SELECT warehouse_id, product_name, location FROM warehouse_inventory WHERE product_name = 'Desk' AND location NOT LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY warehouse_id
SELECT * FROM warehouse_locations;
SELECT warehouse_id, location_name, city, state FROM warehouse_locations ORDER BY city, location_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, warehouse_id FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT warehouse_id, city FROM warehouse_locations WHERE state='NY';
SELECT item_id, item_name, warehouse_id FROM inventory_items WHERE warehouse_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM warehouse_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM warehouse_locations WHERE state = 'CA' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_items GROUP BY warehouse_id HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_id IN (SELECT warehouse_id FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < 50);
SELECT * FROM warehouse_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT location_name, address FROM warehouse_locations WHERE capacity > 100
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY product_id
SELECT view_name, total_inventory FROM distribution_views WHERE view_id = 10
SELECT location_name, address, capacity FROM warehouse_locations WHERE id = 1
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, location_id FROM inventory GROUP BY location_id HAVING SUM(quantity) > 100
SELECT view_name, total_inventory FROM distribution_views ORDER BY total_inventory DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location_id) AS num_locations, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory
SELECT view_name, warehouse_locations_ids[1] AS first_location_id FROM distribution_views WHERE total_inventory > 500
SELECT * FROM warehouse_locations;
SELECT location_name, city FROM warehouse_locations ORDER BY state DESC;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT dc_name FROM distribution_centers WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT item_name, location_name, city, state FROM inventory JOIN warehouse_locations ON inventory.location_id = warehouse_locations.location_id WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT dc_name, location_name, state FROM distribution_centers JOIN warehouse_locations ON distribution_centers.location_id = warehouse_locations.location_id WHERE state = 'California'

SELECT plan_id, dc_name, item_name, quantity FROM distribution_plan JOIN distribution_centers ON distribution_plan.dc_id = distribution_centers.dc_id JOIN inventory ON distribution_plan.item_id = inventory.item_id WHERE quantity > 20 ORDER BY plan_id DESC
SELECT * FROM warehouse_locations;
SELECT location_name FROM warehouse_locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE warehouse_id = 2 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT center_name FROM distribution_centers WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT view_name, view_description FROM distribution_views WHERE distribution_center_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 AND warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT center_name FROM distribution_centers WHERE id IN (SELECT distribution_center_id FROM distribution_mapping WHERE inventory_id = 3);
SELECT view_name, view_description FROM distribution_views WHERE distribution_center_id = 2 ORDER BY view_name ASC;

SELECT warehouse_locations.location_name, inventory.product_name, inventory.quantity FROM warehouse_locations INNER JOIN inventory ON warehouse_locations.id = inventory.warehouse_id WHERE warehouse_locations.location_name LIKE 'A%';
